title: and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 3) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 3) (amendment) (no 2) regulation

title: and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020
and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31 – Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31 – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 3) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 234 of 2020) 
(amended by the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) 
(Covid-19) (No. 3) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 252 of 2020)) is 
amended by the substitution of “the 31st day of August 2020” for “the 10th day 
of August 2020”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 August, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [298] 3

title: and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide that the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 3) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 234 of 2020) will 
remain in operation until 31 August 2020,
